heading: Whole Page Content
summary: Medical assistance for refugees from Ukraine Eligibility for health care and other useful information The right to receive medical care for refugees from Ukraine. As well as useful information about health, vaccination, assistance to HIV-infected people and more. All information about the basic package of services. List of diseases requiring hospitalization. Who pays for the treatment. Find out more Dentistry in Romania: basic dental medicine package Dentist consultation and treatment. A complete list of dental services. The cost of treatment for all categories of patients.
